message.body: Hello, someone new?
Hello. Sorry for the late reply, I just got off of work
That's alright. Wow that's late to get off work.
Sorta. I live in AZ, so it's only 10:30 here
Haha I'm in California so it's the same time...
Sorta. I live in AZ, so it's only 10:30 here
Oh. Well, yeah it's late, but I work at a 24hr Walmart in the grocery department
And you're the first person I've met who isn't from PA
Ahhh gotcha. Yeah I'm a linguistics student in California so that's how I know about this...
Cool. I'm a microbiology student, but I heard about this through my mom who studied linguistics
Oh cool! Are you planning to go into medicine?
Maybe. More genetics research, but that can be applied in medicine too, lime gene therapy
Sounds exciting. Are you just working all summer? Doing anything else?
I'm also finishing up a 10 week anatomy class. It ends in two weeks, but other than that I'm working
Ah yeah. I am also doing the class + work thing, I'm taking a class on language acquisition in children, it's super interesting.
Cool. Sounds more interesting than anatomy
My housemate is a bio/premed major and she's always just memorizing memorizing memorizing...looks so hard
It is sometimes. Other times it's easy. But it really depends on the class and your own learning style
Guess that's true. Her style seems to be hanging out in the library for 12 hours at a time...hahaha
I couldn't do that. I'd go crazy
Yeah I honestly don't know how she does it. Four hours of studying and I'm already braindead...
Yeah. That's about as much as I can handle
